description:
The ēlDLIVE solar system bureau ends up getting a handful of reports of various incidents, and they all seem to have the same individual involved. However, when they did a search on a possible suspect, they find out that there are a lot of aliens with the exact same face... Then another incident involving a suspect with the same face occurs once again. Could the suspect be the same person in each incident? Or were they done by different people with the same face?
Source: crunchyroll
